text: Cao'an is the only temple left from the Manichaean religion. Samuel N. C. Lieu and Ken Parry, Manichaean and (Nestorian) Christian Remains in Zayton (Quanzhou, South China). ARC DP0557098 Werner Sundermann, Samuel N. C. Lieu, It is in Fujian, China. People thought it was a Buddhist temple but they were wrong. In 2021 it became a World Heritage Site. == References == Category:Manichaeism Category:Temples in Asia Category:Buildings and structures in China Category:16th-century buildings and structures
title: Cao'an
